00145 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00146 CNewVisionView* CNewVisionDoc::GetView(int type) {
00147         POSITION pos = GetFirstViewPosition();
00148         while (pos != NULL)
00149         {
00150                 CNewVisionView* pView = (CNewVisionView*) GetNextView(pos);
00151                 if (pView->m_type == type)
00152                         return pView;
00153         }   
00154         return NULL;
00155 }

00189 bool CNewVisionDoc::Initialize() {
00190         if (m_initialized)
00191                 return true;
00192 
00193         EnableNavigation(true);
00194         
00195         // the order of model initialization is important here, because some models rely on others to be initialized
00196         if (!trackermodel.Initialize()) {
00197                 AfxMessageBox("Please select the input source!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00198                 return false;
00199         }
00200         StepProgressDialog();
00201         if (!bgmodel.Initialize()) {
00202                 AfxMessageBox("Please initialize background model!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00203                 return false;
00204         }
00205         StepProgressDialog();
00206         if (!blobmodel.Initialize()) {
00207                 AfxMessageBox("Please initialize blob model!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00208                 return false;
00209         }
00210         StepProgressDialog();
00211         if (!cameramodel.Initialize()) {
00212                 AfxMessageBox("Please initialize camera model!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00213                 return false;
00214         }
00215         StepProgressDialog();
00216         if (!bodymodel.Initialize()) {
00217                 AfxMessageBox("Please initialize body model!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00218                 return false;
00219         }
00220         StepProgressDialog();
00221         if (!skinmodel.Initialize()) {
00222                 AfxMessageBox("Please initialize skin model!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00223                 return false;
00224         }
00225         StepProgressDialog();
00226         if (!doormodel.Initialize()) {
00227                 AfxMessageBox("Please initialize door model!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00228                 return false;
00229         }
00230         StepProgressDialog();
00231         if (!floormodel.Initialize()) {
00232                 AfxMessageBox("Please initialize floor model!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00233                 return false;
00234         }
00235         StepProgressDialog();
00236         if (!obstaclemodel.Initialize()) {
00237                 AfxMessageBox("Please initialize obstacle model!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00238                 return false;
00239         }
00240         StepProgressDialog();
00241         if (!bodyactivitymodel.Initialize()) {
00242                 AfxMessageBox("Please initialize individual activity model!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00243                 return false;
00244         }
00245         StepProgressDialog();
00246         if (!swarmactivitymodel.Initialize()) {
00247                 AfxMessageBox("Please initialize group activity model!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00248                 return false;
00249         }
00250         StepProgressDialog();
00251         if (!zonemodel.Initialize()) {
00252                 AfxMessageBox("Please initialize zone model!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00253                 return false;

00256         if (!messagemodel.Initialize()) {
00257                 AfxMessageBox("Please initialize message model!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00258                 return false;
00259         }
00260 
00261         // Initialize persistant data structures
00262         m_TrackingData.Initialize(this);
00263         m_HeatmapData.Initialize(this);
00264         m_ActivityData.Initialize(this);
00265         settings.GetActivePage()->UpdateData(false);
00266         m_initialized = true;
00267         OnPause(); 
00268         UpdateOverlayInfo();
00269         if (theApp.m_pMainWnd) {
00270                 theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATENAVBAR);
00271                 theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATESTATUSBAR);
00272         }
00273         return true;
00274 }

00299 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00300 BOOL CNewVisionDoc::OnOpenDocument(LPCTSTR lpszPathName) {
00301         // two times in a row doesn't do anything at all: default behavior for ID_FILEOPEN button
00302         // this method is not called if the filename is the same as the open document
00303         ShowProgressDialog("Loading project ...", 22);
00304         if (!CDocument::OnOpenDocument(lpszPathName)) {
00305                 HideProgressDialog();
00306                 return FALSE;
00307         }
00308         bool res = Initialize();
00309         HideProgressDialog();
00310         return res;
00311 }

00318 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00319 void CNewVisionDoc::Serialize(CArchive& ar)
00320 {
00321         CObject::Serialize(ar);
00322         StepProgressDialog("Loading input model...");
00323         trackermodel.Serialize(ar);  
00324         if (ar.IsLoading()) 
00325                 if (!trackermodel.Initialize()) {
00326                         trackermodel.DeInitialize();
00327                         return;
00328                 }
00329         StepProgressDialog("Loading background model...");
00330         bgmodel.Serialize(ar); 
00331         StepProgressDialog("Loading blob model...");
00332         blobmodel.Serialize(ar);
00333         StepProgressDialog("Loading body model...");
00334         bodymodel.Serialize(ar);
00335         StepProgressDialog("Loading skin model...");
00336         skinmodel.Serialize(ar);
00337         StepProgressDialog("Loading door model...");
00338         doormodel.Serialize(ar);
00339         StepProgressDialog("Loading camera model...");
00340         cameramodel.Serialize(ar);
00341         StepProgressDialog("Loading floor model...");
00342         floormodel.Serialize(ar);
00343         StepProgressDialog("Loading obstacle model...");
00344         obstaclemodel.Serialize(ar);
00345         StepProgressDialog("Loading body activity model...");
00346         bodyactivitymodel.Serialize(ar);
00347         StepProgressDialog("Loading group activity model...");
00348         swarmactivitymodel.Serialize(ar);
00349         StepProgressDialog("Loading zone model...");
00350         zonemodel.Serialize(ar);
00351 }
00352 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00353 void CNewVisionDoc::AutoSave()
00354 {
00355         System::Configuration::Configuration ^XML = ConfigurationManager::OpenExeConfiguration(ConfigurationUserLevel::None);
00356         // if autosave is set to "on" and it's time to save
00357         if (XML->AppSettings->Settings["autosave"]->Value 
00358                 && trackermodel.m_frameNumber % Int32::Parse(XML->AppSettings->Settings["autosave interval"]->Value) == 0) {
00359                         // save tracking data
00360                         CTime t = CTime::GetCurrentTime();
00361                         // if folder is chosen use it, otherwise save in current
00362                         String ^dirname = "";
00363                         if (XML->AppSettings->Settings["autosave folder"]->Value != "Choose folder...") {
00364                                 dirname = XML->AppSettings->Settings["autosave folder"]->Value;
00365                                 if (!Directory::Exists(dirname))
00366                                         Directory::CreateDirectory(dirname);
00367                         }
00368 
00369                         CString tname = CString(dirname) + "\\" + "autosave " + t.Format("%a, %B %d, %Y, %I-%M-%S%p")+String::Format(" frame {0}", trackermodel.m_frameNumber) + ".tracking";
00370                         CFile file(tname, CFile::modeCreate | CFile::modeWrite);
00371                         CArchive ar(&file, CArchive::store);
00372                         m_TrackingData.Serialize(ar);
00373                         ar.Close();
00374                         file.Close();
00375                         // save activity data
00376                         CString aname = CString(dirname) + "\\" + "autosave "+t.Format("%a, %B %d, %Y, %I-%M-%S%p")+String::Format(" frame {0}", trackermodel.m_frameNumber)+".activity";
00377                         CFile afile(aname, CFile::modeCreate | CFile::modeWrite);
00378                         CArchive aar(&afile, CArchive::store);
00379                         m_ActivityData.Serialize(aar);
00380                         aar.Close();
00381                         afile.Close();
00382         }
00383 }
00384 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00385 void CNewVisionDoc::OnPause() {
00386         if (!trackermodel.IsInitialized())
00387                 return;
00388         trackermodel.Pause();
00389 
00390         m_wndToolBar.GetToolBarCtrl().CheckButton(ID_PLAY, false);
00391 }
00392 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00393 void CNewVisionDoc::OnPlay() {
00394         if (!trackermodel.IsInitialized())
00395                 return;
00396 
00397         if (trackermodel.IsRunning()) {
00398                 trackermodel.Pause();
00399                 m_wndToolBar.GetToolBarCtrl().CheckButton(ID_PLAY, false);
00400         }
00401         else {
00402                 trackermodel.Run();
00403                 m_wndToolBar.GetToolBarCtrl().CheckButton(ID_PLAY, true);
00404         }
00405         
00406 }

00461 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00462 void CNewVisionDoc::OnGotoFrame() {
00463         CTextEntryDlg dlgTextEntry;
00464         if (!trackermodel.IsInitialized()) {
00465                 AfxMessageBox("Initialize tracker model first!", MB_ICONEXCLAMATION | MB_OK);
00466                 return;
00467         }
00468         if (dlgTextEntry.Show(theApp.m_pMainWnd, "Go To Frame (Ctrl-G)", "Go To Frame Number ...?") == IDOK) {
00469                 CString strResult = dlgTextEntry.GetText();
00470                 REFERENCE_TIME t = _atoi64(strResult);
00471                 trackermodel.SetPosition(t);
00472                 UpdateOverlayInfo();
00473                 if (::IsWindow(theApp.m_pMainWnd->m_hWnd)) {
00474                         theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATENAVBAR);
00475                         theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATESTATUSBAR);
00476                         theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATEACTIVEVIEW);
00477                 }
00478         }
00479 }
00480 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00481 void CNewVisionDoc::OnSetPlaybackRate() {
00482         CTextEntryDlg dlgTextEntry;
00483         if (!trackermodel.IsInitialized()) {
00484                 AfxMessageBox("Initialize tracker model first!", MB_ICONEXCLAMATION | MB_OK);
00485                 return;
00486         }
00487         if (dlgTextEntry.Show(theApp.m_pMainWnd, "Set playback rate(Ctrl-G)", "Set playback speed to (default 1.0) ...?") == IDOK) {
00488                 CString strResult = dlgTextEntry.GetText();
00489                 double r = atof(strResult);
00490                 trackermodel.SetRate(r);
00491         }
00492 }
00493 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00494 void CNewVisionDoc::OnGotoTime() {
00495         CTextEntryDlg dlgTextEntry;
00496         if (!trackermodel.IsInitialized()) {
00497                 AfxMessageBox("Initialize tracker model first!", MB_ICONEXCLAMATION | MB_OK);
00498                 return;
00499         }
00500 
00501         if (dlgTextEntry.Show(theApp.m_pMainWnd, "Go To Time (Ctrl-T)", "Go To Time (hh:mm:ss)?") == IDOK) {
00502                 CString strResult = dlgTextEntry.GetText();
00503                 int H=0, M=0, S=0;
00504                 if (sscanf_s(strResult, "%2d%2d%2d", &H, &M, &S) < 3)
00505                         if (sscanf_s(strResult, "%d.%d.%d", &H, &M, &S) < 3)
00506                                 if (sscanf_s(strResult, "%d:%d:%d", &H, &M, &S) < 3)
00507                                         return;
00508                 int h = trackermodel.m_startTime.GetHour();
00509                 int m = trackermodel.m_startTime.GetMinute();
00510                 int s = trackermodel.m_startTime.GetSecond();
00511                 REFERENCE_TIME t = (_int64)((((H-h)*60+(M-m))*60+(S-s))*trackermodel.m_frameRate);
00512                 trackermodel.SetPosition(t);
00513                 if (::IsWindow(theApp.m_pMainWnd->m_hWnd)) {
00514                         theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATENAVBAR);
00515                         theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATESTATUSBAR);
00516                         theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATEACTIVEVIEW);
00517                 }
00518         }
00519 }
00520 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00521 void CNewVisionDoc::OnStop() {
00522         if (!m_initialized)
00523                 return;
00524         OnPause();
00525         { // +++ begin data processing critical section 
00526                 CAutoLock dataLock( &m_dataCriticalSection); 
00527                 bodymodel.body.RemoveAll();
00528                 m_TrackingData.Clear();
00529                 m_ActivityData.Clear();
00530         } // +++ end data processing critical section   
00531         trackermodel.m_frameLastProcessed = trackermodel.m_frameNumber = trackermodel.m_frameStart;
00532         trackermodel.SetPosition();
00533 }
00534 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00535 void CNewVisionDoc::OnUpdateBG()
00536 {
00537         if (!m_initialized)
00538                 return;
00539         bgmodel.Update();
00540 }
00541 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00542 void CNewVisionDoc::UpdateOverlayInfo() {
00543         if (!m_initialized)
00544                 return;
00545         { // +++ begin data processing critical section 
00546                 CAutoLock dataLock( &m_dataCriticalSection); 
00547                 switch (((CMainFrame*)(theApp.m_pMainWnd))->GetActivePane()->m_type) {
00548                         case VIDEO_VIEW : {
00549                                 cvSet(imgOverlayInfo, CV_INVISIBLE_COLOR);
00550                                 displayLeftInputImage ? cvCopy(imgFrame, imgOverlayInfo) : 1;
00551                                 displayLeftBlobs  ? blobmodel.Draw(imgOverlayInfo, CV_RGB(230,255,230)) : 1;
00552                                 displayLeftBlobHeights ? blobmodel.DrawHeight(imgOverlayInfo, CV_RGB(128,128,0)) : 1; 
00553                                 displayActivityGroups ? bodymodel.DrawGroups(imgOverlayInfo, CV_RGB(255,255,255)) : 1;
00554                                 displayActivitySalesReps ? bodyactivitymodel.DrawSalesReps(imgOverlayInfo, CV_RGB(0,0,255)) : 1;
00555                                 displayActivityDwellingBodies ? bodyactivitymodel.DrawDwellingBodies(imgOverlayInfo, CV_RGB(0,255,0)) : 1;
00556                                 displayLeftTimeStamp ? trackermodel.ShowTimeStamp(imgOverlayInfo) : 1;
00557                                 displayLeftDoors  ? doormodel.DrawFrame(imgOverlayInfo, CV_RGB(255,0,0)) : 1;
00558                                 /*if (m_ProcessingMode == PLAYBACK) 
00559                                         displayLeftBodies ? bodymodel.DrawColorizingConfidence(imgOverlayInfo, CV_RGB(0,255,0), CV_RGB(255,0,0)) : 1;   */
00560                                 displayLeftBodies ? bodymodel.DrawFrame(imgOverlayInfo, CV_RGB(0,255,0)) : 1; 
00561                                 displayLeftBodyHeights ? bodymodel.DrawHeight(imgOverlayInfo, CV_RGB(128,128,0)) : 1; 
00562                                 trackermodel.IplImage2Overlay(imgOverlayInfo, trackermodel.m_bitmap);
00563                                 break;
00564                         }
00565                         case SCENE_VIEW :
00566                                 cvSet(imgOverlayInfo, CV_RGB(255,255,255));
00567                                 displayRightBG     ? bgmodel.Draw(imgOverlayInfo) : 1;
00568                                 displayRightZ      ? bodymodel.DrawZBuffer(imgOverlayInfo) : 1;
00569                                 displayRightBlobs  ? blobmodel.Draw(imgOverlayInfo, CV_RGB(230,255,230)) : 1;
00570                                 displayRightBodies ? bodymodel.DrawFrame(imgOverlayInfo, CV_RGB(0,255,0)) : 1;  
00571                                 displayRightDoors  ? doormodel.DrawFrame(imgOverlayInfo, CV_RGB(255,0,0)) : 1;
00572                                 displayRightCamera ? cameramodel.Draw(imgOverlayInfo, CV_RGB(0,0,0)) : 1;
00573                                 displayRightHistograms ? bodymodel.DrawHistograms(imgOverlayInfo) : 1;
00574                                 displayRightDistancePlane ? cameramodel.DrawDistanceMap(imgOverlayInfo) : 1;    
00575                                 trackermodel.IplImage2Overlay(imgOverlayInfo, trackermodel.m_bitmap);
00576                                 break;
00577                         case ACTIVITY_VIEW :
00578                                 cvSet(imgOverlayInfo, CV_INVISIBLE_COLOR);
00579                                 displayActivityBodies ? bodymodel.DrawFrame(imgOverlayInfo, CV_RGB(0,255,0)) : 1;       
00580                                 displayActivitySalesReps ? bodyactivitymodel.DrawSalesReps(imgOverlayInfo, CV_RGB(0,0,255)) : 1;
00581                                 displayActivityDwellingBodies ? bodyactivitymodel.DrawDwellingBodies(imgOverlayInfo, CV_RGB(0,255,0)) : 1;
00582                                 displayActivityGroups ? swarmactivitymodel.DrawEventsFrame(imgOverlayInfo, CV_RGB(255,255,255)) : 1;
00583                                 trackermodel.IplImage2Overlay(imgOverlayInfo, trackermodel.m_bitmap);
00584                                 break;
00585                         case FLOOR_VIEW :
00586                                 cvSet(floorImg, CV_RGB(255,255,255));
00587                                 displayFloorFloorMap  ? floormodel.Draw(floorImg) : 1;
00588                                 displayFloorHeatMap ? DrawHeatMap(floorImg) : 1;
00589                                 displayFloorObstacles ? obstaclemodel.DrawFloor(floorImg, CV_RGB(255,128,0)) : 1;
00590                                 displayFloorBodyMaps  ? bodymodel.DrawFloor(floorImg, CV_RGB(0,255,0)) : 1; 
00591                                 displayFloorBodyPaths ? m_TrackingData.DrawFloor(floorImg, CV_RGB(0,255,0)) : 1; 
00592                                 //displayFloorBodyTracks ? m_TrackingData.DrawTracksFloor(floorImg, CV_RGB(0,255,0)) : 1; 
00593                                 displayFloorTimeStamp ? trackermodel.ShowTimeStamp(floorImg) : 1;
00594                                 //trackermodel.IplImage2Overlay(floorImg, trackermodel.m_floorBitmap);
00595                                 ((CMainFrame*)(theApp.m_pMainWnd))->GetActivePane()->Invalidate();
00596                                 break;
00597                         default:
00598                                 ;
00599                 }
00600         } // +++ end data processing critical section   
00601 }
00602 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00603 void CNewVisionDoc::OnRecord() {
00604         if (!trackermodel.IsInitialized())
00605                 return;
00606         else if (trackermodel.m_record) {
00607                 CAutoLock singleLock(&m_RecordCriticalSection);
00608                 trackermodel.ReleaseVideoWriters();
00609                 trackermodel.m_record = false;
00610                 m_wndToolBar.GetToolBarCtrl().CheckButton(ID_RECORD, false);
00611         }
00612         else {
00613                 bool wasRunning = trackermodel.IsRunning();
00614                 if (wasRunning) {
00615                         trackermodel.Pause();
00616                 }
00617                 
00618                 RecordDialog recordDlg;
00619                 if (recordDlg.DoModal() == IDOK) {
00620                                 CFileDialog dlg(FALSE, NULL, NULL, OFN_HIDEREADONLY, "AVI Files (*.avi)|*.avi|MPEG Files (*.mpg)|*.mpg|All Files (*.*)|*.*||", theApp.m_pMainWnd);
00621                                 char title[]= {"Select Output File"};
00622                                 dlg.m_ofn.lpstrTitle = title;
00623                                 if (dlg.DoModal() == IDOK) {
00624                                         // trackermodel->out = new FileSource(dlg.GetPathName());
00625                                         CString fileName = dlg.GetPathName();
00626                                         //fileName = fileName.Right(4) == ".avi" ? fileName : fileName + ".avi";
00627                                         m_recordVideoView = recordDlg.m_recordVideoView;
00628                                         m_recordSceneView = recordDlg.m_recordSceneView;
00629                                         m_recordActivityView = recordDlg.m_recordActivityView;
00630                                         m_recordFloorView = recordDlg.m_recordFloorView;
00631                                         CreateVideoWriters(fileName, trackermodel.m_frameRate);
00632                                         trackermodel.m_record = true;
00633                                         m_wndToolBar.GetToolBarCtrl().CheckButton(ID_RECORD, true);
00634                                 }
00635                 }
00636 
00637                 if (wasRunning)
00638                         trackermodel.Run();
00639         }
00640 }
00641 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00642 bool CNewVisionDoc::ChangeMenuItemState(int sub, int item) {
00643         CMenu* mmenu = theApp.m_pMainWnd->GetMenu();
00644         CMenu* submenu = mmenu->GetSubMenu(sub);
00645         MENUITEMINFO info;
00646         info.cbSize = sizeof (MENUITEMINFO); // must fill up this field
00647         info.fMask = MIIM_STATE;             // get the state of the menu item
00648         VERIFY(submenu->GetMenuItemInfo(item, &info));
00649         if (info.fState & MF_CHECKED) {
00650                 submenu->CheckMenuItem(item, MF_UNCHECKED | MF_BYCOMMAND);
00651                 return true;
00652         }
00653         else {
00654                 submenu->CheckMenuItem(item, MF_CHECKED | MF_BYCOMMAND);
00655                 return false;
00656         }
00657 }
00658 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00659 void CNewVisionDoc::OnSettingsParameters() {
00660                 //CRect r1, r2;
00661                 //theApp.m_pMainWnd->GetWindowRect(&r1);
00662                 //settings.GetWindowRect(&r2);
00663         if (theApp.m_pMainWnd->GetMenu()->GetMenuState(ID_SETTINGS_PARAMETERS, MF_BYCOMMAND) == MF_UNCHECKED) {
00664                 theApp.m_pMainWnd->GetMenu()->CheckMenuItem(ID_SETTINGS_PARAMETERS, MF_CHECKED | MF_BYCOMMAND);
00665                 m_wndToolBar.GetToolBarCtrl().CheckButton(ID_SETTINGS_PARAMETERS, true);
00666                 settings.GetActivePage()->UpdateData(false);
00667                 settings.ShowWindow(SW_SHOW);
00668                 //theApp.m_pMainWnd->SetWindowPos(&CWnd::wndNoTopMost, 0,0, r1.Width(), r1.Height()+1/*-r2.Height()*/, SWP_NOMOVE);
00669         }
00670         else {
00671                 theApp.m_pMainWnd->GetMenu()->CheckMenuItem(ID_SETTINGS_PARAMETERS, MF_UNCHECKED | MF_BYCOMMAND);
00672                 m_wndToolBar.GetToolBarCtrl().CheckButton(ID_SETTINGS_PARAMETERS, false);
00673                 settings.GetActivePage()->UpdateData(true);
00674                 settings.ShowWindow(SW_HIDE);
00675                 //theApp.m_pMainWnd->SetWindowPos(&CWnd::wndNoTopMost, 0,0, r1.Width(), r1.Height()-1/*+r2.Height()*/, SWP_NOMOVE);
00676         }
00677 }

00883 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00884 void CNewVisionDoc::LoadLastTrackedFrame() {
00885         REFERENCE_TIME t = m_TrackingData.GetLastRecordedFrame();
00886         if (trackermodel.m_frameNumber < t) {
00887                 OnPause();
00888                 trackermodel.SetPosition(t);
00889                 m_TrackingData.Get((int)t);
00890                 trackermodel.m_frameLastProcessed = t;
00891                 trackermodel.Pause();
00892                 if (::IsWindow(theApp.m_pMainWnd->m_hWnd)) {
00893                         theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATENAVBAR);
00894                         theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATESTATUSBAR);
00895                 }
00896                 trackermodel.m_frameLastProcessed = t;
00897         }
00898 }
00899 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00900 void CNewVisionDoc::EnableNavigation(bool enable) {
00901         if (enable) {
00902                 theApp.m_pMainWnd->GetMenu()->EnableMenuItem(ID_GOTOFRAME, MF_ENABLED | MF_BYCOMMAND);
00903                 theApp.m_pMainWnd->GetMenu()->EnableMenuItem(ID_GOTOTIME, MF_ENABLED | MF_BYCOMMAND);
00904                 m_wndTrackToolBar.EnableWindow(true);
00905                 m_wndTrackToolBar.EnableScrollBar(SB_HORZ, ESB_ENABLE_BOTH);
00906         }
00907         else {
00908                 theApp.m_pMainWnd->GetMenu()->EnableMenuItem(ID_GOTOFRAME, MF_DISABLED | MF_GRAYED | MF_BYCOMMAND);
00909                 theApp.m_pMainWnd->GetMenu()->EnableMenuItem(ID_GOTOTIME, MF_DISABLED | MF_GRAYED | MF_BYCOMMAND);
00910                 m_wndTrackToolBar.EnableWindow(false);
00911                 m_wndTrackToolBar.EnableScrollBar(SB_HORZ, ESB_DISABLE_BOTH);
00912         }
00913 }
00914 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00915 void CNewVisionDoc::OnBnClickedTrackingMode() {
00916         // make sure that tracking from the last frame recorded
00917         EnableNavigation(false);
00918         //trackermodel.SetRate(1.0);
00919         //trackermodel.pMediaFilter->SetSyncSource(NULL);
00920         LoadLastTrackedFrame();
00921         m_ProcessingMode = TRACKING;
00922 }
00923 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00924 void CNewVisionDoc::OnBnClickedHeatmapMode() {
00925         EnableNavigation(false);
00926         //trackermodel.SetRate(1.0);
00927         //trackermodel.pGraph->SetDefaultSyncSource();
00928         m_ProcessingMode = HEATMAP;
00929 }
00930 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

01001 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
01002 void CNewVisionDoc::OnBodyChangeID() {
01003         { // +++ begin data processing critical section 
01004                 CAutoLock dataLock( &m_dataCriticalSection); 
01005                 int id1 = GetView(VIDEO_VIEW)->m_match;
01006                 String ^s = String::Format("From {0} to: ", id1);
01007                 CTextEntryDlg dlgTextEntry;
01008                 if (dlgTextEntry.Show(theApp.m_pMainWnd, "Change body ID", CString(s)) != IDOK)
01009                         return;
01010 
01011                 CString strResult = dlgTextEntry.GetText();
01012                 int id2 = _atoi64(strResult);
01013 
01014                 Body* b;BodyPath* bp;
01015                 int result = IDOK;
01016                 if (bodymodel.body.Lookup(id2, b) || m_TrackingData.data.Lookup(id2, bp)) {
01017                         CString s; s.Format("There is a track with ID = %d, overwrite? ", id2);
01018                         result = AfxMessageBox(s, MB_ICONQUESTION | MB_OKCANCEL);
01019                         if (result == IDCANCEL)
01020                                 return;
01021                 }
01022                 if (result == IDOK)
01023                         m_TrackingData.ChangeID(id1, id2);
01024 
01025                 // replace id1's in current tracking
01026                 bodymodel.body.ChangeID(id1, id2);
01027                 bodymodel.body_deleted.ChangeID(id1, id2);
01028                 
01029                 // if ID was the last one, then update last_id
01030                 if (id1 == bodymodel.last_id-1 && id2 < bodymodel.last_id-1)
01031                         bodymodel.last_id--;
01032                 if (id2 > bodymodel.last_id-1)
01033                         bodymodel.last_id = id2+1;
01034         } // +++ end data processing critical section   
01035         UpdateAll();
01036 }
01037 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
01038 void CNewVisionDoc::OnBodyDeleteID() {
01039         {  // +++ begin data processing critical section        
01040                 CAutoLock dataLock( &m_dataCriticalSection); 
01041                 int id = GetView(VIDEO_VIEW)->m_match;
01042                 String ^s = String::Format("Delete ID = {0} ?", id);
01043                 if (AfxMessageBox(CString(s), MB_ICONQUESTION | MB_YESNO ) == IDNO)
01044                                 return;
01045                 m_TrackingData.data.RemoveKey(id);
01046                 bodymodel.body.RemoveKey(id);
01047                 bodymodel.body_deleted.RemoveKey(id);
01048 
01049                 // if ID was the last one update last_id
01050                 if (id == bodymodel.last_id-1)
01051                         bodymodel.last_id--;
01052         } // +++ end data processing critical section   
01053 
01054         UpdateAll();
01055 }
01056 
01057 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
01058 void CNewVisionDoc::OnBodyTerminateID() {
01059         {  // +++ begin data processing critical section        
01060                 CAutoLock dataLock( &m_dataCriticalSection); 
01061                 int id = GetView(VIDEO_VIEW)->m_match;
01062                 String ^s = String::Format("Discontinue track {0} ?", id);
01063                 if (AfxMessageBox(CString(s), MB_ICONQUESTION | MB_YESNO ) == IDNO)
01064                                 return;
01065 
01066                 bodymodel.body.RemoveKey(id);
01067                 bodymodel.body_deleted.RemoveKey(id);
01068 
01069                 BodyPath* bp;
01070                 if (m_TrackingData.data.Lookup(id, bp))
01071                         bp->CutTail(trackermodel.m_frameNumber);
01072         } // +++ end data processing critical section   
01073         UpdateAll();
01074 }

01078 }

01083 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
01084 void CNewVisionDoc::LoadTrackingData() {
01085         char szFilters[] = "Tracking Data Files (*.tracking)|*.tracking|XML Files (*.xml)|*.xml|CVML Files (*.cvml)|*.cvml|All Files (*.*)|*.*||";
01086         CFileDialog dlg(TRUE, ".tracking", "", OFN_FILEMUSTEXIST | OFN_PATHMUSTEXIST | OFN_HIDEREADONLY, szFilters, NULL);
01087         char title[]= {"Load Tracking Data From..."};
01088         dlg.m_ofn.lpstrTitle = title;
01089         if (dlg.DoModal() == IDOK) {
01090                 {  // +++ begin data processing critical section        
01091                         CAutoLock dataLock( &m_dataCriticalSection); 
01092                         CString filename = dlg.GetPathName();
01093                         ShowProgressDialog("Loading tracking data...");
01094                         if (dlg.GetFileExt() == "xml" || dlg.GetFileExt() == "cvml")
01095                                 m_TrackingData.ImportFromCVML(filename);
01096                         else if (dlg.GetFileExt() == "csv")
01097                                 m_TrackingData.ImportFromCSV(filename);
01098                         else {
01099                                 CFile file(dlg.GetPathName(), CFile::modeRead);
01100                                 CArchive ar(&file, CArchive::load);
01101                                 m_TrackingData.Serialize(ar);
01102                                 ar.Close();
01103                                 file.Close();
01104                         }
01105                 } // +++ end data processing critical section   
01106                 HideProgressDialog();
01107                 if (this->m_ProcessingMode == TRACKING)
01108                         LoadLastTrackedFrame();
01109                 else {
01110                         // update display
01111                         UpdateOverlayInfo();
01112                         trackermodel.SetPosition();
01113                         if (theApp.m_pMainWnd)
01114                                 theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATEACTIVEVIEW);
01115                 }
01116         
01117         }       
01118 }
01119 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
01120 void CNewVisionDoc::SaveTrackingData() {
01121         char szFilters[] = "Tracking Data Files (*.tracking)|*.tracking|Comma Separated Files (*.csv)|*.csv|XML Files (*.xml)|*.xml|CVML Files (*.cvml)|*.cvml\\
01122                 |X3D Files (*.x3d)|*.x3d|All Files (*.*)|*.*||";
01123         CFileDialog dlg(FALSE, ".tracking", "Tracking Data 01", OFN_OVERWRITEPROMPT |OFN_PATHMUSTEXIST | OFN_HIDEREADONLY, szFilters, NULL);
01124         char title[]= {"Save Tracking Data As..."};
01125         dlg.m_ofn.lpstrTitle = title;
01126         if (dlg.DoModal() == IDOK) {
01127                 CString filename = dlg.GetPathName();
01128                 ShowProgressDialog("Saving tracking data...");
01129                 if (dlg.GetFileExt() == "xml" || dlg.GetFileExt() == "cvml")
01130                         m_TrackingData.ExportToCVML(filename);
01131                 else if (dlg.GetFileExt() == "csv")
01132                         m_TrackingData.ExportToCSV(filename);
01133                 else if (dlg.GetFileExt() == "x3d")
01134                         m_TrackingData.ExportToX3D(filename);
01135                 else {
01136                         CFile file(dlg.GetPathName(), CFile::modeCreate | CFile::modeWrite);
01137                         CArchive ar(&file, CArchive::store);
01138                         m_TrackingData.Serialize(ar);
01139                         ar.Close();
01140                         file.Close();
01141                 }
01142                 HideProgressDialog();
01143         }       
01144 }

01190 void CNewVisionDoc::OnVisualizeDataTracks()
01191 {
01192         ShowProgressDialog("Generating track image", m_TrackingData.data.GetCount());
01193         cvSet(floorImg, CV_RGB(255,255,255));
01194         floormodel.Draw(floorImg);
01195         m_TrackingData.DrawTracksFloor(floorImg, CV_RGB(0,255,0)); 
01196         obstaclemodel.DrawFloor(floorImg, CV_RGB(255,128,0));
01197         doormodel.DrawFloor(floorImg, CV_RGB(255,0,0));
01198         HideProgressDialog();
01199         OnDataSaveFloorView();
01200 }
01201 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
01202 void CNewVisionDoc::OnVisualizeDataHeatmap()
01203 {
01204         ShowProgressDialog("Generating track heatmap", m_TrackingData.data.GetCount());
01205         cvZero(motionmap);
01206         m_TrackingData.DrawHeatmap(motionmap);
01207         cvSet(floorImg, CV_RGB(255,255,255));
01208         floormodel.Draw(floorImg);
01209         DrawHeatMap(floorImg);
01210         obstaclemodel.DrawFloor(floorImg, CV_RGB(255,128,0));
01211         doormodel.DrawFloor(floorImg, CV_RGB(255,0,0));
01212         HideProgressDialog();
01213         OnDataSaveFloorView();
01214 }
01215 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
01216 void CNewVisionDoc::DrawHeatMap(IplImage* frame) {
01217         if (!m_initialized)
01218                 return;
01219 
01220         if (motionmap->width != frame->width || motionmap->height != frame->height)
01221                 return;
01222 
01223         double min_val = 0, max_val = 0;
01224         cvMinMaxLoc(motionmap, &min_val, &max_val);
01225         //min_val = 0; max_val = 600;
01226         min_val = 1000;
01227         max_val = max_val;
01228         //cvConvertScale(motionmap, motionmapscaled, 1./max_val);
01229         //cvConvertImage(motionmapscaled, frame);
01230         //cvZero(frame);
01231         for (int y=0; y<frame->height; y++)
01232         for (int x=0; x<frame->width; x++)
01233         {
01234                 int a = sizeof(float);
01235                 float value = ((float*)(motionmap->imageData + motionmap->widthStep*y))[x];
01236                 //int index = (int)(NTEMPERATURES*(value-min_val-1)/(max_val-min_val));
01237                 // LOG scale
01238                 int index = (int)((NTEMPERATURES*log(value)-log(min_val))/log(max_val-log(min_val)));
01239                 index = max(0, min(index, NTEMPERATURES-1));
01240                 //p->B = (unsigned char)(255*(value-min_val)/(max_val-min_val));
01241                 //p->G = 255-p->B;
01242                 if (index>0)
01243                         OpenCVExtensions::Image::setPixel(frame, &HEAT_COLOR[index-1], x, y);
01244         }
01245         drawText(max_val, cvPoint(frame->width-100, 10), frame, CV_RGB(0,0,0), CV_RGB(235,255,235), (float)1.2);
01246         drawText(min_val, cvPoint(frame->width-100, 35), frame, CV_RGB(0,0,0), CV_RGB(235,255,235), (float)1.2);
01247 }
